participant_1.background:
I am looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work.
I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
i am witty.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.

participant_2.background:
I wake up to the sound of my children's laughter.
I love my family, even though they are a little bit crazy.
christmas is my favorite holiday.
my favorite food is a burger.
I was disappointed when my blueberry pie didn't win first place at the county fair.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
I'm doing well! Thank you for asking.
That is good to hear. I am doing well myself. I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay at home mom, but I love it! I get to spend my days with my children and I love watching them grow and learn.
That sounds like an amazing job! I am sure your children are very lucky to have you.
Thank you! I think they are pretty lucky too.
What are some of your favorite things to do with your children?
We love to go to the park, play games, and read books together. We also love to bake cookies and watch movies.
Those all sound like great activities! I love to bake too. I make a mean blueberry pie.
I love blueberry pie! I was disappointed when my blueberry pie didn't win first place at the county fair.
Oh no! That must have been disappointing. I'm sure it was delicious though.
It was! I made it again the next day and ate the whole thing myself.
Haha! I'm sure it was delicious.
Well, it sounds like you have a great life. I'm glad to hear that.
Thank you! I am very happy.
